title: Seasonal Rewards
body: I got banned about a month ago for being toxic in one of my URF games, i just got way to upset, but I've been reformed for about a month and I'm just wondering how long does it take to unlock that honor back unlocked, I'm gold and i would like my seasonal reward and I'm also wondering if it will affect that....i have been honoring people and getting a lot of honors, so I'm just curious thank you for your time!

replies.body:
In order to be eligible for ranked rewards this season, you can't have a ban lasting more than 7 days from 8/22 onwards. So long as you don't get punished again, you should be fine!

Also make sure to double check the [**2017 Season Rewards Eligibility FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068) for the rest of the details!

is there a way to check when i got banned? i want to say it was September 21st of 2017, but i just want to be sure that I'm safe! and is there an approximate time before i earn my honor back, I've been getting honors and honoring people how does the system work? Thank you for your time!

Looks like this ban happened on 8/18, should be good to go as long as it doesn't happen from here on out ^_^!

We don't have an approximate timeline for getting honor back, as you have to sort of 'prove' you're reformed with enough games and good behavior.
Thanks for your help man i really appreciate it!
